Method Detail

crossover

public Schedule crossover(Schedule parent1,
                          Schedule parent2,
                          Configuration config)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException,
                          DatabaseException
Crossover takes two Schedules and produces a new offspring Schedule by mixing both their course allocations.

First the crossover points are generated in order to decide where to mix the Schedules. The crossover points will be represented by a boolean field with a length equal to the number of courses.

As both Schedules have the same number of courses their maps are equal in size. Therefore the crossover will happen by iterating over one of the schedules maps.

The first schedule to start with will be random. The Schedules map will be copied alternating from both partner Schedules to the new offspring. At the same time the course will be inserted duration times into the slots.

If a crosspoint is reached the Schedule from which the map is being copied is switched.

Specified by:
crossover in interface Crossover
Parameters:
parent1 - any initialized schedule.
parent2 - any initialized schedule.
Returns:
A new schedule offspring combining the schedules.
Throws:
DatabaseException
IllegalArgumentException
See Also:
de.fu.scetris.scheduler.Crossover#crossover(de.fu.scetris.scheduler.Schedule, de.fu.scetris.scheduler.Schedule)
